name: Jury Service
description:
Jury service is a short horror game in which you play as a "Justice Authenticator".

Story:

The year is 2065, the world has been taken over by a dystopian oppressive government of unknown origin.  You arrive at your new mandatory job position in the department of justice, however your first day doesn't go nearly as smoothly as you'd like it to.

Notes:

Jury service was developed in about 6 days for the Brackeys 2022.2 game jam. Sorry about some of the low quality but I had some issues with github. This was also my first experience with making a 3d game. Sorry if there are any spelling errors I was rushing a lot.
